nodes.text: The blobstacle course was a course for blob racing on the planet Umgul which was involved in gambling.

The blobstacle course first appeared in Kevin J. Anderson's book Jedi Search where Lando Calrissian visits Umgul in search of a potential jedi for Luke's newly founded academy, later in the first entry of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, a two part article written by Rich Handley and Abel G. Peña and released on the StarWars.com blog in 2013.
